Serkalem Fasil (Amharic: ሰርካለም ፋሲል; amụrụ c
na afọ 1978) bụ onye nta akụkọ obodo Etiopia na onye bụbu onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Asqual, Menilik, na Satenaw.
N'afọ 1997, Fasil malitere ọrụ odeakụkọ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ Wenchef
N'afọ sochirinụ, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ, o guzobere akwụkwọ akụkọ nke ya, Menilik, nke ụlọ mbipụta nke ya wepụtara
Ọ malitere ọzọ, Asqual, na afọ 2001, na nke atọ, Satenaw, na afọ 2004
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ Menilik na onye isi oche nke Satenaw.

Fasil meriri "obi ike na nturu ugo oru nta akuko" site na IWMF (International Women's Media Foundation) n'afọ 2007. O nyere onyinye ego ahụ na Amnesty International iji kelee ya maka inyere aka ịtọhapụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ.
